title: 风格的作者页
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:foxtrot]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
--header-title: "分析学部";
--header-subtitle: "Scientia Potentia Est";
  --logo-img: url("https://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/fonke-hub/%E5%88%86%E6%9E%90%E5%AD%A6%E9%83%A8.svg");
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 768px) { div.zhanwei { display:none}}

.warning-banner {
  background:
    url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-great-hippo/scp_trans.png")
    center no-repeat;
  float: center;
  border: solid 2px #000;
  padding: 1px 15px;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
}

.label {
    background: rgb(var(--bright-accent));
    color: 4b6b52ff;
    padding: 3px;
    border-radius: 4px;
    font-family: monospace;
    white-space: nowrap;
}
[[/module]]

[[div class="modal"]]

**姓名/代号：**风格.aic

**所属部门：**[[[aiad-homescreen |人工智能应用部门]]]/分析学部/地质学部
